title: Kimi to Boku 2
description: Yuuta, Yuuki, Shun, Kaname and Chizuru continue being friends as they become 3rd years in high school. Their everyday life is full of misadventure in both school and love.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
